comments.comments_text: This is really unlucky! Sardar Azmoun (Zenit St Petersburg) attempted to clear the ball away after the opposition’s corner kick into the box, but instead miskicked the clearance and put it into his own net, specifically into the roof of the net. He won't enjoy watching the highlights later.
